about_the_game:
⚔️ From Greenhorn to legend in the Uncounted Isles! 🛡️
Step into the boots of a novice adventurer in the charming Uncounted Isles. You're not here to save the world... at least not yet. Your journey begins with humble tasks that seasoned legendes ignore, but don't be fooled these 'small' quests are the building blocks of your legend.

Progress from chasing mischievous rats to outsmarting crafty bandits and facing spine-chilling undead. Each quest, no matter how small, shapes your story and hones your skills. The beauty lies in the details: every village saved, every item recovered and every mystery solved brings you one step closer to uncovering a plot all other adventurers have overlooked.

Tailor your adventure to your style. Trade with quirky local villagers, discover unique loot and craft the perfect loadout for your evolving tactics. Will you become the go-to problem solver with a mastery of magic or the reliable sword-arm that villagers trust?

Thanks to the Adventurers' Guild's mystical death crystal, your journey never truly ends. Each setback is a chance to learn, adapt and come back stronger. Your safehouse awaits, ready for you to plan your next move. But beware: always store some fallback equipment to recover what's lost.

Uncounted Isles is a passion project, lovingly crafted by a solo developer using a custom-built game engine. This voxel-based, first-person fantasy roguelite RPG celebrates the small victories that lead to bigger adventures. Your support can help shape this indie game's future. Wishlist now on Steam or follow the adventure on Social Media to join our growing community of up-and-coming legendes!

Craft Your Legend, One Quest at a Time:
  • Flexible Roleplaying: Shape your character's destiny with our custom-built progression system
  • Living, Breathing World: Explore handcrafted islands enriched with procedural elements for variety
  • Immersive Perspective: Experience intense, up-close action with our first-person combat system
  • Roguelite Elements: Face consequences for failures, but retain progress and learn from each attempt
  • Economy: Engage in a rich item ecosystem through strategic looting and trading
  • Distinctive Aesthetic: Lose yourself in a world brought to life with charming, unique voxel art

short_description: Start as a greenhorn and rise through the ranks in the Uncounted Isle Archipelago. Tackle threats, master your skills, loot & trade and unravel a plot that's bigger than the adventurer guild expected. Grow into the adventurer you're destined to become!
